description: Purchase of an anaerobic chamber for the National Research Council of Canada (NRC) Centre of Research on Development of Aquatic Resources. The requirement is a multifaceted purchase. Anaerobic chamber workstation along with all the required equipment, defined in the attached official tender documentation. The purchase includes technical specifications, installation instructions, training, maintenance, operation, and testing and evaluation.

### **Tender Description**

The National Research Council Canada (NRC) has a requirement for the supply of an anaerobic chamber. The chamber must meet all technical requirements, which include:

*   A gloveless sleeve design to allow users to remove their arms while maintaining an anaerobic environment
*   Integrated vacuum pump to maintain an oxygen-free environment
*   Ability to accommodate 600 standard-sized petri plates
*   Clear/transparent window for observing samples
*   Temperature control between 5 to 70 degrees Celsius

Contractors are required to provide a complete set
